title: Shopping in Japan: an invitation to quality
brief_description: Retail traders in Japan offer a very wide range of quality consumer goods to the people of Japan and vistors to the country. These include goods made in both the traditional manner by craftsmen in home industries and in small vilalge factories, and those made in the new efficient industrial complexes.
